resources.string: To permanently delete unused sample data, choose a time frame from the list below.\n\nOnly sample data provided with ChipsList will be deleted; data you have entered will be kept regardless of when it was last used.
Microphone Icon. Press to dictate information.
An item with this name already exists. Please revise the item name.
Blank item names are not permitted. Please revise the item name.
Location of this item in the store.
Size of the product - eg. 16 oz, 1 box
Enter the price of the item.
To remove ads from ChipsList, click here.
Say the item\'s location (eg. Bakery, Produce)
Say the item\'s size, such as 1 bag or package)
Say the item\'s price: (eg \"three point seven nine\")
Enter tax rate as a number with an optional decimal. (eg. 6 or 8.25)
is already in your store list.

This app will help you create and manage your shopping lists, while also helping to make your trips more organized and effective. ChipsList will help you shop faster and more efficiently.\n\nTo learn about our other apps, please visit our web site:
This is the default help message
No stores were found. Use this screen to add a new store.
No items were found. To create a new item or add an existing item to the list, click the green + in the Action Bar.

Add new items to your shopping list from this screen.

Add the item's name, location, package size, price and the quantity you wish to purchase. Voice support is provided, click the microphone icon and dictate the information.

Also, the screen supports horizontal scrolling (if necessary).
Add a new store from this screen.\n\nYou can enter the store\'s name and the tax rate (as a percent, such as 8.25)
Delete a store from this screen by tapping the red X button to the right of the store\'s name.\n\nTap on the store\'s name to go to an update screen to rename the store or change the tax rate.

The Trip Summary screen displays details about the cost of this trip to the store.\n\nThe top half of the screen shows totals for all items, and the bottom half is information about the items you\'ve checked off your list.

This is ChipsList\'s main screen; from this screen you can select a store by tapping on the store\'s name. You can also add stores by tapping the green + in the Action Bar. Update or remove the store by Long Tap on it.

This is the shopping list for a particular store - to add additional items to the list, tap the green + in the Action Bar.

(When Available) Tap the phone icon in the Action Bar to send the shopping list via SMS, to someone in your contact list.

 Tap the $ icon in the Action Bar to see the Trip Summary Screen

Italics and green text indicate the item has a price and quantity.

Tap the item's name to update it.

Long Tap the item to delete or do price comparisons.

Tap the Options Menu to remove items from the list or set the display sort order.
This screen permits you to update the store name and tax rate.

Use this screen to select items to move to the current store's shopping list.

Tapping on the "Add New Item" button will enable you to create a new item.

Tapping an item will go to the update screen for the item.

Long Tapping the item will go to the Price Comparison screen.

After selecting items, click the "Move Checked" button to move them to the store's list.

Use this screen to specify the order you visit departments in the store. Enter a number for the department, tap "Save" when you have completed setting the order.\n\nWhile you are on the shopping list page, you can set the department sort order from the Options Menu.
This screen permits you to change the department, item size, price or quantity. You can not change the item name.\n\nVoice support is provided, click the microphone icon and dictate the information.
